mapper.select: SELECT QM.send_date, QM.read, QC.member_id, QM.question_chat_id, m.name, QC.id, m.file_id FROM ( SELECT id, send_date, read, member_id, question_chat_id, name , row_number() over ( partition by question_chat_id order by id desc ) rm FROM question_message QMSG ) QM JOIN QUESTION_CHAT QC ON QM.question_chat_id = QC.id JOIN member m ON QC.member_id = m.id WHERE rm = 1 ORDER BY send_date DESC
